page.title: 09Recreation in Rishton
page.content: In Rishton there is quite a variety of recreation. The three most popular are Enfield and Rishton Cricket Clubs and Clayton Harriers, which is nationally known. There are other clubs not as frequently used but still very popular like the squash, golf, horticultural clubs and evening classes. The canal is used for canoeing, fishing and other things. Children can go to youth clubs and guide and scout groups and for younger children the playgroup. For boys there various football teams to choose from and girls can join the Rishton netball teams. In parks there are very few things, which is a disappointment. For older people there are whist and dominoe drives at the Old Folk's Centre which are very well supported.
